page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: Several interested members of{Colwall {Women's Institute }surveyed our allocated block and discovered many {fascinating features}previously unknown to us. The following members contributed all of{the text:-}Mrs.Jean Simon,President Mrs.Jane Blaydes Mrs.Stella Whitmore Mrs.Jane Ferdinando Mrs.Gerry Elliott Mrs.Mary Bragg Mrs.Mary Ritchie Miss Peggy Ballard (Aged 85 years) The{photographs}were taken and described by Mrs.Whitmore who with Mrs.Blaydes then{edited and typed}in the text and counts, using a{home BBC {micro_computer. All members agreed that the excercise had been an{enjoyable education.
